#summary Using Gource with CVS projects via cvs-exp

== Using Gource with CVS projects via cvs-exp ==

[http://gource.googlecode.com/files/cvs-exp.pl cvs-exp.pl] is a tool which converts the CVS log ouput into a more conventional changes grouped together into chronological order that Gource knows how to read.

Assuming cvs-expl.pl is installed (and you have [http://www.perl.org/ perl]), you can generate a log from your CVS project and run in Gource by doing the following:

{{{
cd my-cvs-project
cvs-exp.pl -notree > my-cvs-project.log
gource my-cvs-project.log
}}}
